<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Eye of the Arclords](/Feats.aspx?ID=870) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 81 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day;

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2); [Arcane Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=754)

**Access**
 You are a member of the Arclords of Nex.

</column>

---

You open an incandescent third eye upon your forehead. The eye can remain open for 1 minute, and you can close it before then with a single action with the concentrate trait. It can remain open for 2 minutes if you’re a master in Arcana, or 5 minutes if you’re legendary. While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits: you gain the effects of the [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell; you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415); you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). After your third eye closes, you are [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for an amount of time equal to how long you had it open.
